data.comment: The match is underway in Toronto.
Can Toronto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Philadelphia's half?
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Philadelphia in their own half.
Throw-in for Philadelphia at BMO Field.
Toronto to take a throw-in in Philadelphia territory.
In the minute 2, Throw-in Philadelphia.
Toronto awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Philadelphia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Philadelphia in their own half.
Goal! Philadelphia have got their heads in front thanks to a Sergio Santos strike.
Victor Rivas signals a Toronto throw-in in Philadelphia's half.
In the minute 7, Toronto have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
Corner awarded to Toronto.
In Toronto Toronto attack through Pablo Piatti. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 8, Goal kick for Philadelphia at BMO Field.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Toronto in their own half.
Toronto to take a throw-in in Philadelphia territory.
In the minute 11, Philadelphia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Toronto are pushing forward but Jozy Altidore's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Philadelphia goal kick.
In the minute 13, Throw-in for Philadelphia at BMO Field.
Sergio Santos for Philadelphia gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Toronto have a goal kick.
In the minute 15, Can Toronto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Philadelphia's half?
Can Toronto capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Philadelphia's half?
Toronto have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
In the minute 18, Toronto have a dangerous throw-in.
Victor Rivas awards Toronto a goal kick.
Philadelphia have a goal kick.
In the minute 20, Toronto awarded a free kick in their own half.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Philadelphia.
Toronto needs to be cautious. Philadelphia have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 21, Ball goes out of play for a Philadelphia goal kick.
Victor Rivas signals a Toronto throw-in in Philadelphia's half.
Corner awarded to Toronto.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Toronto close to the penalty box.
Goal kick for Philadelphia at BMO Field.
Toronto awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 30, Philadelphia drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Jamiro Monteiro (Philadelphia) shoots â€“ and rattles the crossbar!
In Toronto Philadelphia drive forward through Kacper Przybylko. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 31, Kacper Przybylko of Philadelphia is pulled up for offside.
Can Philadelphia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Toronto's half?
Victor Rivas signals a throw-in for Toronto, close to Philadelphia's area.
In the minute 33, Free kick Toronto.
Victor Rivas signals a Toronto throw-in in Philadelphia's half.
Toronto to take a throw-in in Philadelphia territory.
In the minute 35, Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Philadelphia in their own half.
Ball safe as Toronto is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Justin Morrow for Toronto who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 38, Greg Vanney (Toronto) has taken off Justin Morrow who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Tony Gallacher is the replacement.
Throw-in for Toronto close to the penalty box.
Victor Rivas awards Philadelphia a goal kick.
In the minute 41, Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Philadelphia in their own half.
Victor Rivas signals a throw-in for Philadelphia, close to Toronto's area.
Philadelphia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 44, Philadelphia have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
Corner awarded to Toronto.
Philadelphia have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Victor Rivas signals a Philadelphia throw-in in Toronto's half.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Can Philadelphia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Toronto's half?
In the minute 45, Victor Rivas blows to end the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Philadelphia to take a throw-in in Toronto territory.
In the minute 47, Goal kick for Toronto at BMO Field.
Toronto have a dangerous throw-in.
Philadelphia needs to be cautious. Toronto have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 50, Philadelphia to take a throw-in in Toronto territory.
Jozy Altidore is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Nick DeLeon (Toronto) has replaced the possibly injured Jozy Altidore at BMO Field.
In the minute 54, Can Toronto capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Philadelphia's half?
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Philadelphia.
Philadelphia push upfield but Victor Rivas quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 57, Throw-in Philadelphia.
Goal! Ayo Akinola (Toronto) levels the score at 1-1 with a header.
Tony Gallacher instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Toronto in their own half.
Toronto's Pablo Piatti gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Philadelphia goal kick.
In the minute 61, Philadelphia's Alejandro Bedoya breaks free at BMO Field. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Victor Rivas awards Toronto a goal kick.
Ball safe as Toronto is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 62, Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Philadelphia in their own half.
Goal kick for Philadelphia at BMO Field.
Toronto awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 65, Anthony Fontana is replacing Brendan Aaronson for Philadelphia at BMO Field.
Toronto awarded a free kick in their own half.
Philadelphia needs to be cautious. Toronto have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 71, In Toronto Toronto attack through Pablo Piatti. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Philadelphia goal kick.
Jim Curtin is making the team's second substitution at BMO Field with Ilsinho replacing Sergio Santos.
In the minute 72, Victor Rivas signals a Toronto throw-in in Philadelphia's half.
Toronto have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
Free kick in a good position for Toronto!
In the minute 76, Corner awarded to Toronto.
Alejandro Pozuelo heads in to make it 2-1 at BMO Field.
That's a fine assist from Pablo Piatti.
In the minute 78, Can Philadelphia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Toronto's half?
Victor Rivas signals a throw-in for Philadelphia, close to Toronto's area.
Philadelphia pushes forward through Kacper Przybylko, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 82, Toronto awarded a free kick in their own half.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Toronto in their own half.
In the minute 83, Throw-in Philadelphia.
Jose Martinez (Philadelphia) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Toronto in their own half.
Throw-in for Philadelphia at BMO Field.
In the minute 85, Pablo Piatti of Toronto gets in a strike, but is off target.
Philadelphia have a goal kick.
Greg Vanney (Toronto) is making a third substitution, with Tsubasa Endoh replacing Pablo Piatti.
In the minute 86, Patrick Mullins is on a sub for Ayo Akinola for Toronto.
Victor Rivas signals a Toronto throw-in in Philadelphia's half.
Victor Rivas awards Philadelphia a goal kick.
Toronto awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Philadelphia to take a throw-in in Toronto territory.
Alejandro Bedoya (Philadelphia) strikes at BMO Field but his header is cleared.
Can Toronto capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Philadelphia's half?
Throw-in for Philadelphia in their own half.

Throw-in for Toronto close to the penalty box.
Can Toronto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Philadelphia's half?
Toronto have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Toronto goal kick.
That's full-time at BMO Field. The final score is 2-1.
Philadelphia make their third substitution with Andrew Wooten replacing Matt Real.
